title: Brand Assets
heading: Rox Brand Assets
subtitle: Download logos and brand resources for Rox
description: Official logos and brand assets for the Rox project. Feel free to use these in articles, presentations, or projects related to Rox.

usageGuidelines.title: Usage Guidelines
usageGuidelines.intro: Please follow these guidelines when using Rox brand assets:

dos.title: Do
items: Use the official logos provided here
Maintain adequate clear space around the logo
Use the logo on backgrounds that provide sufficient contrast

donts.title: Don't
items: Modify the logo colors or design
Place the logo on busy or low-contrast backgrounds
